showerReviews.reviewText: Good place to fast fuel and snack good selection of Wisconsin cheese üßÄ, shower 14$ they also have haircut üíá‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ like a gas mall. They have more retail options than a lot of towns in Wisconsin have. I can take a shower, get my hair cut, have a meal, load up on groceries and snacks...I think I can even buy gasoline here. Need a bigger flag, though ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ whole lot! lol it would be different if they actually had something that was here that would have been worth it. Like the lukewarm shower with low water pressure I took. I‚Äôm sorry I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews on truck stops. But this! To ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is very small with nothing to eat. There's plenty of land to make more spots. I only came for a shower using a free credit I had and there was no hot water at all. Know was all the way over and it was like warm. 2 people at the register, ‚Ä¶

This TA has gone downhill to the point where they don't even have hot water for their shower guests.... was told, "They had it fixed yesterday," Multiple people said the samething "good luck with it, there's no hot water".... the kitchen/ ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ or 60 gallons of fuel or $30 in store non-fuel purchase. I do wish they had better/more food options. Parking lot is big. Shower was clean and hot. Store layout is a little confusing. Honestly a lot better than the loves or pilot next door.

Friendly and helpful staff. Shower was small but clean and well stocked.

showerReviews.reviewText: I am stopping at Kwik Trip for years for fuel food etc. Spending a lot of money just to be told they don't have showers at this time. It is Saturday Morning 1am, After long week just wanted to take a shower and relax. But, no they are to ‚Ä¶

As a trucker I give there showers a 1 out of 5..üëéüèøüëéüèø there was alot of mole. They told me they was aware of it and they try to stay on top of it but its hard..  There showers are $8 so cant complain i guess...You be the judge from the pics. ‚Ä¶

My goodness, I love this Kwik Trip‚ù§Ô∏èüíØ...I took a shower, and the water was hot; the water pressure was perfect, plus they gave me two fluffy big towels without me asking for it. I'm definitely coming back, the next time I'm in townüòç ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ a bunch of different stuff. Clean bathrooms. Good shower rooms with decent water pressure good hot water nice and clean and spacious. But the shower rooms have no ac so it gets very very hot in there. Almost feels like you need a ‚Ä¶

This is only a review of the showers since That‚Äôs all I stopped for when I got here. Boy are they nice, obviously they are remodeled as is the whole truck stop. Not a fan of paying for parking but 2 hrs is plenty of time for me to shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to finish their 30 while you still have driving time. They have 2 hour free parking to take a shower and get your business done, pay $50 total in store (which includes tacobell. Dunkin'  showers  the blue badger grill and bar,etc).,get ‚Ä¶

This place is the worst place a been in when you try to use the shower from the ‚ùå the app You cannot use it if you go inside to use it they gonna do the same thing and you‚Äôre gonna spend 130 or  120 gallon with no shower and they charge you ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ doesn't. Its OK/ average, clean and lots of newly remodeled space. Brand new clean showers although they forgot to refill the toilet paper in mine (good thing the shower heads are hand-helds). Restaurant (Blue Badger) sucks. Long wait ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and out going. The store side and restaurant was clean. Did laundry and took showers everything was clean. Water very hot for our shower and shower room was large enough for both my husband and myself. Jennifer the cashier was ‚Ä¶
Really enjoyed remodeled shower, it's about time! Good job. Can't wait to see it when this facility gets full remodel, restaurant too.
Reviews said showers were clean. Yes they were! Water was hot and never ran out. ‚Ä¶

Garbage. Poor service, over priced and slow as Granny on a cold winter day. It took 2hrs and 2 minutes to get a shower and eat so they reward you with a $15 fee to leave the lot. Steer clear.....money grab! Stealing your $$$$ to pay for a ‚Ä¶
One of the last few clean and friendly truck stops. Clean shower,great food always great price for fuel. Bar and restaurant. Keep it in the same way guys.

showerReviews.reviewText: Had great shower. Great water pressure, room not to small, fan worked, and clean. What was a surprise was to see fresh food on the grill. That is the exception to how most Pilots are oblivious to the fact that We all run at different times ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ On this Day I had nothing but Trouble with everything on daily Basis and when I went for a relaxing shower I met a nice Lady on the Desk and she made my Day better. Thanks for the Hug and may God bless you, your Family and the crew in this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is the cleanest Pilot I have personally come across! You can tell the restroom/shower staff (I was present on 10/21/24) and property management was so intentional and took pride in their work. Thank you so much, and keep up the great work ‚Ä¶

BigTHANK YOU to Charles and Cassy n the staff at this location!!! Showers were down due to inability to wash towels but were very quick and kind to tell me if I have a towel they will open a shower for me! This is one of my 2 Favorite ‚Ä¶

Loved this pilot I drive team . Was getting showers here . Until one decided she wanted to be racist and I didn‚Äôt have the right gender and had to move my rig . Other trucks was park it was 2 :am I needed a shower but what can you expect ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and got diesel fuel and DEF fluid and went and parked the semi truck went into the building and got my receipts and shower number and then waited 40 minutes and I was third in line and I went to the bathroom came back out and asked ‚Ä¶

Would give zero stars if possible. Horribly slow! Don't stop here if u want a shower. Waited over an hr when there were only 3 ppl ahead of us! On top of that, there were six ppl on line and only one cashier. Never again stopping here üòí ‚Ä¶

Staff is friendly and helpful. Shower was clean and had all its garment hooks. Arby's is friendly and has good food. This is a small to medium sized Pilot and is usually busy. There might be a small line, but the staff is very good about ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ arrived from McLane needs to be cloned. She is very nice and courteous. She makes you feel welcome!! As opposed to some pilot employees who act like it will ihurt them to do the job their paid for!!  Shower and coffee were excellent!! üëçüòé ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Truck wash is just across the street and a repair shop just opened behind it...and if thats not enough...you know you could use a shower! ‚Ä¶
